He is expected to meet Gbagbo, who has resisted demands to step down from the presidency, and Alassane Ouattara , who is the internationally recognised winner of November 28 elections, a diplomat told AFP. Bingu wa Mutharika is coming to see the two Barack Obamas , the African diplomat said, without giving details.
